message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product, which we're confident you'll appreciate greatly. Given its superior quality, it's priced at $1000000. This investment promises significant value over time, considering its exceptional performance and durability. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable.

I'd prefer to see some evidence of the product's quality in the market before making a decision. Perhaps if you offer a lower price or a guarantee, I might reconsider.
